Name: Astral Towers
About the game: Astral Towers is a turn-based card game mixing strategy and puzzle elements. Rich single-player campaign: 89 missions at 2 difficulty levels Smart AI enemies for single-player experience Hot-seat multiplayer: play together on a single computer This is a remastered version of the original Astral Towers game released in 2011. It features improved interface, better graphics (was: 1366x768, now - FullHD/4K) and tuned balance.
